short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that allows you to hide files in pull requests and adds highlighting for notifications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that makes using pull-requests for code reviews a more enjoyable experience!

Features:

* Ability to toggle files while reviewing code
* Ability to navigate to full branches from PR view
